workflows.name: Review and Select Vendor
workflows.description: Review vendor quotes and purchase parts

workflows.name: Vendor Submit Quote
workflows.description: Submit competitive quotes for parts requests

workflows.name: Messaging Capability
workflows.description: Cross-cutting messaging feature enabling contextual communication

workflows.name: Vendor Confirmation & Shipping
workflows.description: Confirm orders and ship parts to buyers

workflows.name: Integrated Vendor - SW Buyer Timeline
workflows.description: Integrated vendor acts as middleman for SW buyer requests

workflows.name: Integrated Vendor - Non-SW Buyer Timeline
workflows.description: Integrated vendor sources through SW for phone/email orders

workflows.name: Integrated Vendor Auto-Sourcing
workflows.description: Intelligent tiered vendor sourcing when lacking inventory

workflows.name: Integrated Vendor Fulfillment Pass-Through
workflows.description: Orchestrate fulfillment when selected for sourced parts

W01.description: Parts request (W01) generates opportunities for vendors (W03) and quotes for buyers to review (W02)

W02.description: Reviews quotes generated from W01 parts requests and W03 vendor submissions

W03.description: Vendors respond to requests from W01, creating quotes reviewed in W02

W04.description: Messaging capability available across all workflows for contextual communication

W05.description: Vendor fulfills orders after buyer selection in W02

W06.description: Integrated vendor becomes buyer when lacking stock, orchestrating network sourcing and drop-ship fulfillment

W07.description: Integrated vendor uses SW to source parts for phone/email orders, bridging traditional and marketplace channels

W08.description: Detailed implementation of integrated vendor auto-sourcing with tiered vendor release system for optimized procurement

W09.description: Integrated vendor orchestrates fulfillment between original buyer and third-party vendor, maintaining seamless experience for both parties
